title: Packers or Panthers? (Football 12/05)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Jason La Canfora to break down the latest news and notes from around the NFL, including the firing of Mike McCarthy (3:20), a discussion about who is running things in Green Bay (13:00), the Panthers situation with Ron Rivera (20:00), whether the Panthers job is better than the Packers (27:00), what will happen with Kareem Hunt (33:00) and a run down of who will win some of the hotly contested divisions out there. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
